answers.answer: With my first pregnancy, I had the orange drink. Everybody said that one tasted gross, but I liked it. It tasted really good just super sugary. And with this pregnancy I drank the fruit punch one, and it was good as well. It just has more sugar than usual.
The first couple sips aren't too bad, but once you get half way through it gets really nasty.
Its not that bad. Kinda like orange sherbert and tang but I made myself drink it as fast as possible because its so sugary it was hard for me to swallow.
They have orange and fruit. It tasted like kool aid
When do yu take the test ((?))

question: How bad is the orange stuff you have to drink? I have to take my diabetes test tomorrow but I heard so much and I'm nervous.
title: Diabetes Test !
